title: Data Entry & Analysis
job_overview:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and organized Data Entry & Analyst to support data entry, validation, and coordination across teams. This role is essential in ensuring the accuracy and consistency of data within our platform, contributing to successful project execution and client satisfaction. If you're tech-savvy, process-driven, and enjoy working with data, weâ€™d love to hear from you!

Apply here:Upgrade to see actual info

Key Responsibilities
Enter and update large volumes of data into our cloud-based platform.
Review and verify data for accuracy and completeness.
Identify and resolve data inconsistencies or anomalies.
Collaborate with internal teams to track task progress and project updates.
Maintain organized documentation and follow established workflows.
Use Excel and Google Sheets for data formatting, analysis, and reporting.
Perform quality checks to support system accuracy and reliability.
Prioritize tasks to meet project deadlines and client expectations.

Qualifications
Experience in a data entry, operations, or administrative support role.
Familiarity with cloud-based software tools and online platforms.
Proficient in Microsoft Excel, Google Sheets, and Google Workspace apps.
Strong attention to detail and accuracy in handling data.
Excellent time management and organizational skills.
Comfortable working independently and within a team environment.
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
Ability to follow structured processes and adapt to new systems quickly.
